procedures.title: Language Selection
steps: Select desired language from available options: English, Deutsch, Español, Suomi, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Norsk, Português, Svenska, 中文
procedures.expected_outcome: Interface language changed to selected option

procedures.title: First Time System Setup
steps: Apply power to turn on unit
Wait for setup wizard to appear
Follow wizard prompts to set screen orientation
Set language preferences
Configure additional settings as prompted

procedures.title: Locking Screen - Landscape Orientation
steps: Press lock button on dashboard bar

procedures.title: Unlocking Screen - Landscape Orientation
steps: Swipe from right edge of display

procedures.title: Locking Screen - Portrait Orientation
steps: Press lock button on dashboard bar

procedures.title: Unlocking Screen - Portrait Orientation
steps: Swipe from bottom of display

procedures.title: Power On Procedure
steps: Apply power to unit

procedures.title: Pin Dashboard
steps: Press and hold on desired dashboard
Select position on dashboard bar
Release to pin dashboard
procedures.expected_outcome: Dashboard is pinned to dashboard bar

procedures.title: Unpin Dashboard
preconditions: Dashboard must be currently pinned to dashboard bar
steps: Press and hold on pinned dashboard in dashboard bar
Select unpin option when it appears
Release to unpin dashboard
procedures.expected_outcome: Dashboard is removed from dashboard bar

procedures.title: Navigate Between Pinned Dashboards
steps: Swipe left to view next pinned dashboard
Swipe right to view previous pinned dashboard

procedures.title: Accessing Home Screen
steps: Select the Home button
View available options on screen: Settings, Browser, Dashboards, Status bar, and Dashboard bar
procedures.expected_outcome: Home screen is displayed with all navigation options visible

procedures.title: Using Dashboard Bar
steps: Locate Dashboard bar at bottom of screen
View pinned dashboards in favorites section
View recently used dashboards
Note that active dashboard will be highlighted
Use Lock button to secure dashboard
procedures.expected_outcome: Successfully navigate and manage dashboards via Dashboard bar

procedures.title: Creating New Dashboard
steps: Select Dashboards option
Choose 'new dashboard' option
Create custom dashboard

procedures.title: Accessing System Settings
steps: Locate Settings button
Select Settings button

procedures.title: Using Browser Function
steps: Locate Browser button
Select Browser button
Access B&G CPU web server or browse internet
procedures.expected_outcome: Browser function activated for web access

procedures.title: Edit or Delete Dashboard
steps: Navigate to home screen
Press and hold on desired dashboard
Select edit or delete option from menu
procedures.expected_outcome: Dashboard edited or deleted as selected

procedures.title: Customize Gauge Settings
steps: Locate gauge to customize
Press and hold on the gauge
Select from available edit options
procedures.expected_outcome: Gauge settings updated according to selections

procedures.title: Create New Dashboard
steps: Select 'Create New Dashboard' option
Choose starting point: blank dashboard, template, or saved dashboard
Follow configuration prompts

procedures.title: Change Gauge Settings
steps: Select gauge
Choose data to display on gauge

procedures.title: Resize Gauge
steps: Select gauge
Use resize controls to adjust gauge size

procedures.title: Change Dashboard Attributes
steps: Access dashboard settings
Modify dashboard attributes

procedures.title: Access System Settings
steps: Select system settings option from home screen

procedures.title: Use Quick Access Menu
steps: Swipe from top edge of display
Select desired option (brightness/night/day mode/report issue)
procedures.expected_outcome: Quick access menu appears and selected function activates

steps: Select desired language from available options: English, Deutsch, Español, Suomi, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Norsk, Português, Svenska, 中文
procedures.expected_outcome: Interface language changed to selected option
